overview: Scammers Jin-gyoo and Yoo-ri are planning to meet Jeong-mi and Ho-yeong, who run a pension in the suburbs. He takes the target and approaches the couple with a film director and actress concept.  Jeong-mi becomes interested in the movie director, and Jin-gyoo encourages her to make tens of times more profit by investing in her film.  When Jeong-mi and Ho-yeong hesitated, Yoo-ri, pretending to be an actress, seduced Ho-yeong and Jin-gyoo seduced Jeong-mi and eventually received investment.
title: Swapping With Female Actress
